:py:mod:`src.settings`
======================

.. py:module:: src.settings


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: env_path
   

   Path to the .env files.

.. py:data:: ENVIROMENT
   

   String variable defining the enviroment to start flask in.

.. py:data:: DB_NAME
   

   The name of the database.

.. py:data:: KEY
   

   Secret key for Flask.
